mapper.insert:
SELECT nextval('reportprocessrecordcounts_id_seq')
insert into reportprocessrecordcounts (id, process, assessmentprogramid, contentareaid, gradeid, count, createddate, batchreportprocessid) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{process,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assessmentProgramId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contentAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{count,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{batchReportProcessId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

SELECT nextval('reportprocessrecordcounts_id_seq')
insert into reportprocessrecordcounts
id,
process,
assessmentprogramid,
contentareaid,
gradeid,
count,
createddate,
batchreportprocessid,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{process,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{assessmentProgramId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{contentAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{gradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{count,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{batchReportProcessId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.select: select assessmentprogramid, contentareaid, gradeid , count(*) from studentreport where batchreportprocessid = #{batchReportProcessId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and filepath is not null group by assessmentprogramid, gradeid, contentareaid order by assessmentprogramid, contentareaid, gradeid

select ord.assessmentprogramid, ord.contentareaid, ord.gradeid, count(*) from organizationreportdetails ord join reportsmedianscore rms on rms.organizationid = ord.organizationid where ord.batchreportprocessid = #{batchReportProcessId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and rms.subscoredefinitionname is null and ord.gradeid is not null and rms.organizationtypeid = (select id from organizationtype where typecode = #{organizationTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) group by ord.assessmentprogramid, ord.contentareaid, ord.gradeid
